# fxy-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                 | Type                                                                                | Default |
| ---------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `fxy`      | `fxy`       | A shorthand for setting flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis. Accepts standard CSS flex property values or a valid unit of measurement applied as a width and flex-basis. | `string`                                                                            | `''`    |
| `fxyAlign` | `fxy-align` | Align self. Allows the default alignment (or the one specified by align-items) to be overridden for individual flex items.                                                  | `"" \| "auto" \| "baseline" \| "center" \| "flex-end" \| "flex-start" \| "stretch"` | `''`    |
| `fxyLg`    | `fxy-lg`    | A shorthand modifier of fxy for setting flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis for large devices.                                                                           | `string`                                                                            | `''`    |
| `fxyMd`    | `fxy-md`    | A shorthand modifier of fxy for setting flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis for medium devices.                                                                          | `string`                                                                            | `''`    |
| `fxySm`    | `fxy-sm`    | A shorthand modifier of fxy for setting flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis for small devices.                                                                           | `string`                                                                            | `''`    |
| `fxyXl`    | `fxy-xl`    | A shorthand modifier of fxy for setting flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis for extra large devices.                                                                     | `string`                                                                            | `''`    |
| `fxyXs`    | `fxy-xs`    | A shorthand modifier of fxy for setting flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis for extra small devices.                                                                     | `string`                                                                            | `''`    |
